inputs.name: output_path
inputs.description: output path for test file in container, must be a fully qualified path

inputs.name: local_output_path
inputs.description: where to copy the files out of the container

inputs.name: install_cli
inputs.description: Whether to install the Codecov CLI. Set to false if you have previously installed the CLI.

inputs.name: main_branch
inputs.description: The main branch to compare against

inputs.name: run_tests
inputs.description: Whether to run the tests with the given command in the container. If set to true, this will run the test command and upload to Codecov

inputs.name: test_command
inputs.description: Command to run in container to execute tests. Required when run_tests is true. This should be `pytest` with the desired args at this point.

inputs.name: codecov_cli_upload_args
inputs.description: List of args to pass to cli on upload. This is kind of a hack pending a more robust solution

inputs.name: codecov_cli_yml_path
inputs.description: Path to codecov cli yml. Currently expected to include flag as well --codecov-yml-path=codecov_cli.yml for ex.
